titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of a history of the Committee on Ways and Means.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to Subcommittee on Procurement and Printing.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended).
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
House Committee on House Administration Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Rules.
Senate Committee on Rules discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/23/1988--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Authorizes the printing of a bicentennial history of the House Committee on Ways and Means, commemorating the creation of that committee on July 24, 1789. Authorizes additional printing of copies of such document for the use of the committee.
